title: Are vaccinations required? - Somatheeram Ayurvedic Health Resort
author: Lars Mallwitz
description: We recommend the latest vaccinations such as tetanus, diphtheria and hepatitis. Ultimately only your doctor can give you valid information on this matter.
cleaned_text: We recommend the latest vaccinations such as tetanus, diphtheria and hepatitis. Ultimately only your doctor can give you valid information on this matter.
